author: Samantha Pearson
title: World’s Strangest Opera House, Deep in the Jungle, Makes Unusual Pitch to Locals
text:
MANAUS, Brazil—It’s nearly lunchtime in the sweltering Amazonian city of Manaus and Angela Araújo is waiting for the takeout she ordered: Handel, with a side of Mozart.
Ms. Araújo, 53, can barely contain her excitement as her order pulls up in a clapped-out Fiat Palio. It is Pedro Panilha, the opera house’s sprightly pianist, joined by a portly opera singer squeezed into a satin-lined waistcoat.
“Oh...
